posts.post_content:
Here is a nice looking Bobby Wallace card.  The slight paper loss over the name ruins the otherwise great looking card.  Price: $40 shipped!  See pics:

[URL=http://s1349.photobucket.com/user/setbuilder1/media/Bobby_Wallace_10_zps91fddb98.jpg.html][IMG]http://i1349.photobucket.com/albums/p759/setbuilder1/Bobby_Wallace_10_zps91fddb98.jpg[/IMG][/URL]

[URL=http://s1349.photobucket.com/user/setbuilder1/media/Bobby_Wallace_10_2_zpsbae1566b.jpg.html][IMG]http://i1349.photobucket.com/albums/p759/setbuilder1/Bobby_Wallace_10_2_zpsbae1566b.jpg[/IMG][/URL]
Bump for price drop.  HOF card!

I will take the Wallace.  PM forthcoming.

Best,

Eric
